pageContext.description: The hilt plate, which has been broken off & recently soldered onto the blade, is thick & heavy & uneven. It has 2 rivet holes, one of which is filled with corrosion. The bevel of the cutting edge is visible in places.
pageContext.patina: shades of dark brown patina & some green.
pageContext.surface: slightly rough. the edges are uneven.
pageContext.publications: In the Murray Catalogue, this is called a fragment of a leaf shaped sword, but it is much more like a dagger, or a knife.
pageContext.collection: Museum of Archaeology & Ethnology, Cambridge, No. 193 Murray Collection
